import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; function Branch() { const timersRef = useRef([]); useEffect(() => { const counter = (id, start, end, duration) => { let obj = document.getElementById(id), current = start, range = end - start, increment = end > start ? 1 : -1, step = Math.abs(Math.floor(duration / range)), timer = setInterval(() => { current += increment; obj.textContent = current; if (current === end) { clearInterval(timer); } }, step); // Add the timer to the refs array timersRef.current.push(timer); }; counter("count1", 0, 200, 7000, 0.05); counter("count2", 0, 20, 6000, 1); counter("count3", 0, 16, 6000, 1); // Cleanup function to clear intervals when the component unmounts return () => { timersRef.current.forEach(clearInterval); }; }, []); return ( <>
